lead_paragraph: Republicans are signaling that they plan to push bills and strategies to undermine labor’s political clout and ability to grow.
snippet: Republicans are signaling that they plan to push bills and strategies to undermine labor’s political clout and ability to grow.

headline.print_headline: Unions Fear Rollback of Rights Under Republicans

headline.seo: Unions Fear a Rollback of Rights if G.O.P. Takes Control
headline.sub: Labor Unions Fear Rollback of Rights if G.O.P. Wins
